Header.title: Get Better Care For Your Health
Header.paragraph: One-stop shop for all IT services needs of any customer in Healthcare Industry.

About.paragraph: Welcome to ABC Hospital, your number one source for all things services. We're dedicated to providing you the best of service, with a focus on dependability customer service.We're working to turn our passion for Health Care into a booming service. We hope you enjoy our products as much as we enjoy offering them to you.
Why: Supports corporate clients, insurance and TPA
Why2: PACS/DICOM Viewer for Radiology Labs – uses HL7 protocol

Testimonials.text: "I recently found myself under your care for a cardiac issue. While there, accompanied by my wife, we found that the entire staff at ABC Hospital was exceedingly professional and efficient, from your E.R. receptionists to the cardiac care team."
Testimonials.name: John Doe

Testimonials.text: "On behalf of my wife, who was a patient in your hospital, I humbly submit my sincere gratitude to the management and staff of Jamaica Hospital, especially to your outstanding nurses and PCAs. They have been outstandingly helpful and provided a high quality of service, care and comfort to my wife. Thank you."
Testimonials.name: Johnathan Doe

Testimonials.text: "I was recently cared for at ABC Hospital following a heart attack while at JFK. I just wanted to say a few words about the exceptional care I received in the Jamaica Hospital Cardiac Care Unit and the MICU. All of the doctors and nurses were friendly, pleasant, kind, thorough, conscientious and professional. I am happy to have been in their care."
Testimonials.name: John Doe

Testimonials.text: "I am writing on behalf of my brother who was a patient in your hospital. I would like to thank you on behalf of my entire family for the help and consideration shown to me in what was a very difficult time. Again, I would like to thank you for the services you provide to patients and their families."
Testimonials.name: Johnathan Doe

Testimonials.text: "I am writing this letter to thank everyone at your wonderful hospital for the excellent care that was given to me. Within minutes of arriving in the emergency room I was treated for what was diagnosed as a mild stroke. I want to thank the entire staff for the kind and caring assistance I received, including the security guards, ER staff, and the doctors, nurses and aides on the third floor. Everyone!"
Testimonials.name: John Doe

Testimonials.text: "I was admitted to ABC Hospital’s Labor and Delivery Unit and I am writing this letter to inform you of my experience.I was very nervous entering the emergency room. My nervousness was reduced when I was greeted with several smiles from your staff."
Testimonials.name: Johnathan Doe
